title: Destination Point
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Great Britain
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Schools - Great Britain
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/London (England) - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/London (England) - Social life and customs
abstract: Some of Kings Cross most youthful citizens talk about the area and their lives.
description: Year 5 Primary school pupils from Kings Cross explore the ethnic diversity of their area and school. Kings Cross is an international destination point. Thousands of people travel in and out of the station every day. Some are travelling through on their way to somewhere else, some come into work and others travel to Kings Cross and make it home.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002794; Britain's First Light; Active; 2013
